v.v: The earth and everything in it belongs to Yahweh;
he built the land on the water,
Who will be allowed to go up onto Mount Zion in Jerusalem,
Only those whose actions and thoughts are pure,
They are the people who come to God,
Do you know who the glorious king is?
Do you know who the glorious king is?
